article_title: America's Health Care-Cost Slowdown Goes Kaput; What Should Republicans Say (And Do) About It?

article_metadata.description: Candidates should explain not just how they’ll replace Obamacare, but also how they are going to fix the problems that led to it in the first place.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
